title: Legal Aid Agency
description: We provide civil and criminal legal aid and advice in England and Wales to help people deal with their legal problems. LAA is an executive agency, sponsored by the Ministry of Justice .

details.body:

ordered_featured_documents.title: Civil news: inquest legal help means testing rules change
ordered_featured_documents.summary: Bereaved families at inquests can apply to be excepted from the legal help means test using form CW1 INQ after a rule change on 4 September 2023.

ordered_featured_documents.summary: New tool now available for providers to check a client’s financial eligibility for civil legal aid.

ordered_featured_documents.summary: Providers and experts requesting approval for overnight accommodation costs should know that guideline rates are increasing from 1 September 2023.

body.content:

Jo holds responsibility for Her Majesty’s Prison and Probation Service and oversight for Legal Aid Agency, Official Solicitor and Public Trustee, Office of the Public Guardian and Criminal Injuries Compensation Authority.

The team works closely with LAA Digital and teams across the LAA to implement change. This includes improvements to our digital services, as well as implementing policy changes.
